entry.source: I want someone to deliver some {F804,5}film{F804,0} to a{F801}demon slayer. Her hobby is taking pictures of{F801}Tokyo, even though it's dangerous out there.{F801}She's kind of an oddball, if you ask me...{F801}Anyway, I have the film, but I need somebody{F801}to deliver it. I'm in the Ashura-kai shop in Ueno.{F801}

entry.source: This is the shopkeeper. I'm pretty sure{F801}that photographer Hunter is still in the{F801}Ueno area, since she wanted to take pictures{F801}of shrines and temples. Make sure to give{F801}her the film.{F801}
